title: Shortcut French | Web develoPer
description: A blog for Korean people learning French. While studying French to survive in France, I realized that there was a serious shortage of French materials in Korean, so I have created this blog. Posting articles every time I learn new expressions and grammars. Made with a dark theme to reduce eye strain
name: Shortcut French

children.value: A blog for Korean people learning French.
While studying French to survive in France, I noticed that there was a serious lack of resources for learning French for Koreans. Finally, I decided to create this blog.
Posting articles every time I learn new expressions and grammars. Made with a dark theme to reduce eye strain.
On top of SEO (Search Engine Optimization), lazy loading was used as much as possible to optimize
